db:abstract.db:para: [top-level-component] Root QML type is a component.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [top-level-component] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: QML top level type can't be Component
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used the Component type as top level type for your QML file.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Your QML file already defines a component by itself. Using a Component type as a top level type will wrap your component into another unnecessary component.
